title: Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Position: Executive Assistant

Job Description:
- Virtual Meeting Coordination: Schedule, set up, and manage virtual meetings and video conferences, including client touch bases and discovery calls.
- Communication Management: Handle phone calls and SMS via the companyâ€™s direct line, ensuring timely, professional communication.
- Email and Calendar Management: Oversee and manage email correspondence, calendar scheduling, and appointments for the founders.
- Client Relations and Support: Act as the primary point of contact for my clients, addressing their needs and resolving queries efficiently.
- Administrative Support: Provide comprehensive administrative support to our operations department
- Contract Management: Draft, send, track, and manage client contract agreements and ensure all necessary documentation is in place.
- Lead Management: Actively engage in lead nurturing to ensure a warm pipeline of potential clients.
- Social Media Assistance: Collaborate with the marketing team to manage social media accounts and contribute to ongoing campaigns.
- Project Support: Assist the founders with various tasks, projects, and ad-hoc assignments as needed.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Lead mining experience using Linkedin and Sales Navigator
- Proficiency with project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello)
- Familiarity with remote work tools and best practices
- Experience in a remote administrative or virtual assistant role
- Ability to manage additional duties and special projects as assigned
- Strong command of communication and collaboration platforms (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Slack, Google Workspace)
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Outstanding organizational and time management skills
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Use AI tools like Chatgpt and Google Gemini for day-to-day work
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines
- Demonstrated discretion and confidentiality in handling sensitive information
